is.label: Input Selection
is.caption: Take control over input selection by spending specific utxo"s in your account.

import.label: Import Transaction
import.caption: Import an unsigned or signed transactions, exported from Eternl or sources.
import.upload: Upload transaction file(s) or paste the raw transaction cbor.

tf.label: Token Fragmentation
tf.caption: Spread your assets over multiple utxo's to lower fees for future transactions.

notification.start: Start building token-fragmentation transactions. This may take a while.
notification.finish: Finished creating token-fragmentation transactions. Prepare signing.
notification.error2: Добави още {{currency}} или увеличи размера на TF пакета и опитай пак.

cu.label: UTxO Collection
cu.caption: Collect UTxOs of this account, basically merging them into fewer ones. Will create up to 10 transactions at a time. Processing might take a while.

notification.start: Start building collect-utxo transactions. This may take a while.
notification.finish: Finished creating collect-utxo transactions. Prepare signing.

ms.label: Special Collection
ms.caption: Collect UTxOs of this ms fee wallet, basically merging them into fewer ones. Will create up to 10 transactions at a time. Processing might take a while.

donation.label: Дари 1 {{currency}} за да подкрепиш разработката на $t(common:appName)
donation.caption: Надяваме се, че Eternl ти харесва! Моля, обмисли да изпратиш 1 {{currency}} с тази транзакция, за да подкрепиш развитието на нашия проект.

customMetadata.label: Custom Metadata
customMetadata.caption: Add a custom metadata schema in JSON format according to specification.
customMetadata.urllabel: Documentation about the metadata json format on cardano.org
customMetadata.added: Following metadata was added to the transaction:

schemainfo.NoConversions: Faithfully converts between the minimal shared feature set between JSON and Metadata.
schemainfo.BasicConversions: Adds additional support for byte (as hex strings) and integer keys (as strings).
schemainfo.DetailedSchema: Verbose JSON schema but with most flexibility for metadata conversion.

error.title: Not a valid Cardano JSON general metadata schema
error.label:
Invalid label(s).
Top level keys must be unique integers in the range -(2^64 - 1) to (2^64 - 1).

metadata.label: Add on-chain $t(common:message.label)
metadata.caption:
Add a message/comment/memo to the transaction.
Press "ENTER" for multi-line message.

error.overflow: Number of characters per line is limited to 64. Press Enter to add a new line
error.invalidJSON: Not a valid Cardano JSON general metadata schema.
